original_title: Welcome Back, Kotter XXX: A DreamZone Parody
overview: Welcome back to Brooklyn 1975, where the clothes are tight and the girls are out of sight! The Sweat Hogs are hitting the streets looking for good times. They experience more excitement than anyone could hope for in some very surprising places. The results are classic comedy and hotter than a New York summer!
title: Welcome Back, Kotter XXX: A DreamZone Parody
